title: 98.1% Bengaluru respondents push for EV transition of fleets for last mile delivery: Study
description: A study by Sustainability Mobility Network reveals that 98.1% of Bengaluru respondents find EV transition crucial for reducing air pollution. Over 80% are willing to switch to brands with strong emission reduction commitments. The report, released on World EV Day, highlights consumer demand for sustainable practices in last-mile delivery services.
